column4: Does anyone here know how to configure wine on ubuntu? I got the newest version from the wineHQ respository and installed it through synaptic. Now when I try to run winecfg and hit ok it tries to write  the files to C:\..., Is there a way I can fix this so it doesnt do that?
let it do what its doing the change the home dir
let it do what its doing the change the in wine
try auto config tools like sidenet or winetools
